Assets.Name: Aeroponics
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: You have a high yield aeroponics bay to enrich your food supply. When you [Resupply](Moves/Recover/Resupply) at a settlement in need of fresh food, add +1 or take +2 momentum on a hit. The food takes some time to regrow.
Assets.Ability2: You have cultivated part of the bay into a meditative arboretum. Once per journey when you [Undertake an Expedition](Moves/Exploration/Undertake_an_Expedition), you may take time to recenter yourself and [Hearten](Moves/Recover/Hearten). If you do, add +2.
Assets.Ability3: You have an ideal growing environment for a specialized herb. Envision what this herb does. Then, when you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by using this herb, add +2. Once pruned, this herb takes significant time to regrow.

Assets.Name: Armory
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you [Enter the Fray](Moves/Combat/Enter_the_Fray) to oppose an invader within your vehicle, boost. On a strong hit, they were unprepared for your firepower. Add +1 to all moves until you roll a one on your action die.
Assets.Ability2:
You may prepare for engaging in combat by taking limited-use armaments from your armory. If you do, one time only, when you [Enter the Fray](Moves/Combat/Enter_the_Fray), choose your approach.
     * Going in hot: On a hit, take +2 momentum. On a strong hit with a match, also mark progress.
     * Gain the upper hand: Add +2.
Assets.Ability3: You may prepare for a drawn-out battle by taking specialized ammunition. If you do, during a single combat scene only, you may reroll any action die showing a one when you [[Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike)](Moves/Combat/Strike) or [Clash](Moves/Combat/Clash).

Assets.Name: Drones
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Your set of hoverbike-sized drones are equipped with combat analytics to fight at your side.  When you [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) aided by the drones, add +1.  When you [Clash](Moves/Combat/Clash), take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability2: Your drones are equipped with triangulating astronavigation sensors. When you [Undertake an Expedition](Moves/Exploration/Undertake_an_Expedition) (+wits) using the drones to help guide your command vehicle on a journey, boost and suffer -1 integrity to the drones.
Assets.Ability3: Your drones are equipped with stealth plating, false signal projectors and sensor jamming systems. When you make a move against a specific foe or threat to avoid detection with their help, boost and suffer -1 integrity to the drones.

Assets.Name: External Refit
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Your command vehicle is sealed against high pressure environments and can travel underwater. When you [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) to traverse hazardous underwater currents or areas of dangerous debris, boost.
Assets.Ability2: Your command vehicle is equipped with radiation reflective plating. When you [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) from a hostile space environment, boost.
Assets.Ability3: Your command vehicle has a modular design that shifts its physical form to fit the situation. If you take time to reconfigure your ship or [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) to do it swiftly, declare a stat. Thereafter, when you make a move with your command vehicle utilizing that stat, roll with advantage. With all other stats, roll with disadvantage.

Assets.Name: Holodeck
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Your holodeck helps you practice and prepare. Declare a path asset you are training for, and set your training cycle to 0. Once per journey when you [Undertake an Expedition](Moves/Exploration/Undertake_an_Expedition), you may train in the holodeck. If you do, roll +integrity or +an appropriate stat. On a hit, take +1 training cycle. When your training cycle is at 4 and you [Advance](Moves/Legacy/Advance) to gain or upgrade the declared asset, it costs -1 XP. Then, set your training cycle to zero and declare a new path asset.
Assets.Ability2: When you [Gather Information](Moves/Adventure/Gather_Information) or [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by talking to a holographic facsimile of an expert, add +1.
Assets.Ability3: When you take time for yourself and [Hearten](Moves/Recover/Hearten) using a favorite recreational program, add +1.

Assets.Name: Stabilizers
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Your deflector array clears the way for safer passage. When you [Undertake an Expedition](Moves/Exploration/Undertake_an_Expedition) through debris or asteroid fields, boost.
Assets.Ability2: Your inertial dampeners protect the ship's vital systems. When you [Withstand Damage](Moves/Suffer/Withstand_Damage) from spaceborne environmental factors, add +2.
Assets.Ability3: Your gravity compensators create an isolating graviton field about your ship. When you [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) from gravitational forces around a star or stellar phenomenon, you may reroll any dice.

Assets.Name: Tractor Beam
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Your tractor beam can tow a smaller vehicle, asteroid or other willing object. When you make a move with the tractor beam, take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability2: As above, but add +1 to the move as the beam splits into several smaller beams for finer manipulation of smaller objects.
Assets.Ability3: When you take a minute or so to invert the polarity of your tractor beam and charge it, roll +integrity or +wits. On a hit, the beam is reversed and charged, and it may be released in a single blast. On a weak hit, as above, but it takes time. [Lose Momentum](Moves/Suffer/Lose_Momentum) (-1). On a miss, the charge fails and you must [Withstand Damage](Moves/Suffer/Withstand_Damage) (-2). If you make a move to push a foe or obstacle away by releasing the charge, take an automatic strong hit.

Assets.Name: Aquatic HOV
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Your unarmed HOV can be launched from orbit to splashdown into deep waters and holds several people and their equipment. When you [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) or [React Under Fire](Moves/Combat/React_Under_Fire) to navigate through hazardous waters, avoid obstacles, or evade an attack, boost. A single use rocket may be fired to return the HOV to your command vehicle.
Assets.Ability2: When you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) or [Gather Information](Moves/Adventure/Gather_Information) by scanning your surroundings with sensors, boost.
Assets.Ability3: When you make a move using the sub's manipulator arms to perform a delicate or forceful task, boost.

Assets.Name: Constable
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: You are an agent of the law from a nearby locality. Envision where your authority comes from. When you invoke the law and [Compel](Moves/Adventure/Compel) a person familiar with the authority you are associated with, boost.
Assets.Ability2: When you [Swear an Iron Vow](Moves/Quest/Swear_an_Iron_Vow) (formidable or greater) to bring a lawbreaker to justice, reroll any dice. After you [Fulfill Your Vow](Moves/Quest/Fulfill_Your_Vow) and score a hit, if you [Make a Connection](Moves/Connection/Make_a_Connection) with a victim of the criminal, add +2.
Assets.Ability3: When you [Gather Information](Moves/Adventure/Gather_Information) while investigating a crime, you may roll a three dice challenge. On a miss with a match, envision what you learn of a deepening conspiracy or betrayal, make the rank of your quest one higher (no greater than epic), and use the new rank when marking future progress.

Assets.Name: Cosmic Constructor
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: You can mold cosmic energy into small, basic shapes with a physical form that last from a few moments to a few minutes. When you rest and meditate to gather this energy, roll +spirit. On a strong hit, take up to +3 energy. On a weak hit, take +2. On a miss, take +2 energy but [Endure Harm](Moves/Suffer/Endure_Harm) (-2). Your max energy is +5. When you make moves aided by your constructs to attack or overcome obstacles, add +2 and suffer -1 energy.
Assets.Ability2: As above, but your constructs may be medium sized with multiple shapes.
Assets.Ability3: As above, but your constructs may be larger, more intricate, more durable or longer lasting. If they are, suffer -2 energy when used instead of -1.

Assets.Name: Enhanced
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Your DNA was spliced with that of another species, known or unknown. Envision a permanent change this bestows upon your body and how others react to it when they find out. When you make a move directly aided by this change, add +1. On a strong hit, take +2 momentum. On a miss with a match, [Endure Harm](Moves/Suffer/Endure_Harm) (-2) as your body temporarily rejects the DNA.
Assets.Ability2: A second change permanently affects your body as above, but the benefits of the two changes do not stack.
Assets.Ability3: Encoded in your altered DNA is something that could change humanity forever. If you [Swear an Iron Vow](Moves/Quest/Swear_an_Iron_Vow) to uncover this change (rank extreme or epic), reroll any dice. When you [Fulfill Your Vow](Moves/Quest/Fulfill_Your_Vow) and score a hit, mark two boxes on your discoveries legacy track.

Assets.Name: Linguist
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: You were trained in several languages and dialects found throughout the Forge. When you [Ask the Oracle](Moves/Fate/Ask_the_Oracle) if you know a specific language or dialect you encounter, increase the likelihood by one step.
Assets.Ability2: When you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by taking significant time to decipher an unknown language or decrypt a language based cypher, add +2.
Assets.Ability3: When you [Compel](Moves/Adventure/Compel) using figurative language or slang to strike emotional chords in a language not native to you, roll with advantage.

Assets.Name: Logistician
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you focus or meditate to [Gather Information](Moves/Adventure/Gather_Information) about a place, being, or situation (in person or remotely) by puzzling through the logical causes, effects or outcomes, boost.
Assets.Ability2: When you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by researching the circumstances of a concerning situation looking for connections that others may have missed, you may reroll any dice.
Assets.Ability3: When you [Compel](Moves/Adventure/Compel) using a researched and evidence-based argument, you may roll +wits instead of +heart. If you do, take +2 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Precog
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: You can see brief moments into the future allowing you to attempt avoiding mistakes. When you score a miss on [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger), [Clash](Moves/Combat/Clash) or [React Under Fire](Moves/Combat/React_Under_Fire), you may choose for this to have been a vision of an avoidable future. If you do, [Lose Momentum](Moves/Suffer/Lose_Momentum) (-2), envision how you approach the situation differently and reroll any dice. On a strong hit, take +1 momentum.
Assets.Ability2: As above, but it can be used when you score a miss on [Enter the Fray](Moves/Combat/Enter_the_Fray), [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) or [Gain Ground](Moves/Combat/Gain_Ground).
Assets.Ability3: When you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) with your precognitive ability, [Lose Momentum](Moves/Suffer/Lose_Momentum) (-2) and make the hit options add +2 and take +1 momentum instead of the normal options.

Assets.Name: Psionic
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you [Compel](Moves/Adventure/Compel) by inserting a strong suggestion into someone's mind, roll +wits and roll with advantage. This suggestion may not force the person to cause harm to themself or to their loved ones, but it may induce reckless or unwise behavior. If the suggestion is for a behavior the target wants to perform anyway but is restraining themself, add +1 as well.
Assets.Ability2: When you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by determining if someone is lying or [Compel](Moves/Adventure/Compel) a person or group of people to speak truthfully, roll with advantage.
Assets.Ability3: When you [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) or [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by projecting a brief but convincing illusion into the mind of another being, roll with advantage.

Assets.Name: Quantum Tunneler
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) or [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by quantum tunneling to a position nearby and within sight, add +2 but treat a weak hit as a miss. If through an obstacle to a nearby but unseen location, treat a weak hit as a miss but take +2 momentum on a strong hit.
Assets.Ability2: When you [Clash](Moves/Combat/Clash) and score a weak hit, you may forgo marking progress to be in control as you tunnel away. When you [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) and score a weak hit, you may mark progress only once (instead of twice) to be in control as you tunnel to reposition.
Assets.Ability3: When you attempt to quantum entangle yourself to a location, roll +heart or +wits. On a hit, you may quantum tunnel to that location from any distance, but it is dangerous. On a miss, as above but the entangling is harmful. [Endure Harm](Moves/Suffer/Endure_Harm) (-2). When you [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) to do so, treat a weak hit as a miss. Once used, the entanglement fades.

Assets.Name: Rebel
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you take this asset, declare an oppressive faction that you are actively working against. When you [Swear an Iron Vow](Moves/Quest/Swear_an_Iron_Vow) (formidable or greater) to protect a community from the actions or influence of that faction, reroll any dice. When you [Fulfill Your Vow](Moves/Quest/Fulfill_Your_Vow) and score a hit, also mark 2 ticks on your bonds legacy track.
Assets.Ability2: When you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) or [Gain Ground](Moves/Combat/Gain_Ground) by sabotaging the equipment or resources of that faction, boost.
Assets.Ability3:
When you [Enter the Fray](Moves/Combat/Enter_the_Fray) against forces of that faction, you may choose an approach.
     * Call them out: Roll +heart and add +2.
     * Make them pay: Roll +iron and mark progress on a hit.

Assets.Name: Rocketeer
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Your jet pack allows you to hover mid-air, make jet-assisted leaps, or fly over short distances. It has a max of 5 fuel and can be refueled on your command vehicle. When you make a move using your jet pack to overcome an obstacle or gain a better position, add +2 and suffer -1 fuel.
Assets.Ability2:
When you make a move reacting to an imminent threat by rapidly relocating using
a burst from your jet pack, boost and suffer -1 fuel.
Assets.Ability3: When you [Undertake an Expedition](Moves/Exploration/Undertake_an_Expedition) (+edge) across difficult terrain assisted by your jet pack, suffer -1 fuel and take +1 momentum on a hit. On a strong hit with a match, you surge ahead. Mark progress.

Assets.Name: Scientist
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you take this asset, mark your area of expertise. With sufficient time (a couple of hours or more), you may [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by doing scientific analysis of a problem or inventing prototype technology within your area of expertise. On a hit, one time only, when you or an ally make a move aided by this knowledge or device, take an automatic strong hit.
Assets.Ability2: When you [Gather Information](Moves/Adventure/Gather_Information) by reviewing research or speaking with colleagues about your area of expertise, reroll any dice. On a match, you reveal an unexpected consequence or danger on this topic. Mark 1 tick on your discoveries legacy track.
Assets.Ability3: When you [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) by relying on theoretical knowledge from your area of expertise, boost.

Assets.Name: Security Guard
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you [Swear an Iron Vow](Moves/Quest/Swear_an_Iron_Vow) to provide someone or something protection for a time, set aside an action die with a value of 6. Then, when you [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) to protect that person or thing from harm, add an amount equal to half the die value (rounded up) and reduce its value by 1. When the die would reduce to 0, remove it.
Assets.Ability2: Your training in security comes in handy during a fight. When you [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) or [Clash](Moves/Combat/Clash) in close quarters in order to incapacitate your foe without hurting them, boost.
Assets.Ability3: When you [Gather Information](Moves/Adventure/Gather_Information) by attempting to intuit the intentions or motives of a potential threat to someone or something you protect, you may rely on your instincts. If you do, roll +heart with advantage. If on a strong hit a threat is uncovered, take +2 momentum and add +1 to your next move.

Assets.Name: Telepath
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you attempt to establish a telepathic link with another person who is physically present, roll +wits and boost. On a strong hit, you can speak with them telepathically from any distance. On a weak hit, as above, but the bond fades after a time. On a miss, as a weak hit, but it is stressful. [Endure Stress](Moves/Suffer/Endure_Stress) (-2).  Only twice your wits score of links may be active at a time.
Assets.Ability2: When you edit a person or being's memories from a 24-hour period, roll +wits a three dice challenge. On a strong hit, the memories are altered. On a weak hit, the memories are altered, but it is stressful. [Endure Stress](Moves/Suffer/Endure_Stress) (-2). On a miss, something goes wrong. [Pay the Price](Moves/Fate/Pay_the_Price). Altered memories return after several hours or several days.
Assets.Ability3: When you [Gather Information](Moves/Adventure/Gather_Information) or [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by observing through another person's senses, roll +wits with advantage.

Assets.Name: Voidshifter
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Chaotic void energies altered your physiology allowing you to shapeshift your appearance for short periods of time. When you make a move to deceive or avoid notice by altering your physical appearance, boost. On a weak hit, it is painful. [Endure Harm](Moves/Suffer/Endure_Harm) (-1). On a miss, the transformation fails. [Pay the Price](Moves/Fate/Pay_the_Price).
Assets.Ability2: When you shapeshift your body to increase your battle prowess, envision the change and roll +iron or +health. On a strong hit, set aside an action die with a value of 6. When you [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) or [Clash](Moves/Combat/Clash) leveraging this change, boost and reduce the value of the die by 1. When the die would be set to 0, the transformation ends. On a weak hit, as above but it is painful. [Endure Harm](Moves/Suffer/Endure_Harm) (-1). On a miss, the transformation fails. [Pay the Price](Moves/Fate/Pay_the_Price).
Assets.Ability3: When you [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) due to dangerous environmental conditions, boost as your body shifts to handle the conditions better.

Assets.Name: Well-Connected
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by finding a person with knowledge or experience about a specific topic, you may add +2. If you do, treat a weak hit as miss.
Assets.Ability2: When you [Make a Connection](Moves/Connection/Make_a_Connection) with someone who has a favorable relationship with another person you already have connection with, add +1. On a hit, [Develop Your Relationship](Moves/Connection/Develop_Your_Relationship) with your original connection.
Assets.Ability3: When you [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) or [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by leveraging the fact that you have a relationship with a connection, you may reroll any dice. If you do and score a miss, [Test Your Relationship](Moves/Connection/Test_Your_Relationship) when next you communicate with that connection.

Assets.Name: Crew Member
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Your crew member has a specific role aboard your command vehicle. When you make a move directly aided by their expertise, reroll your action die if its value is less than your crew member's health. If you then score a strong hit with a match, mark 1 tick on your bonds legacy track.
Assets.Ability2: When you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) or [Gather Information](Moves/Adventure/Gather_Information) by conferencing with your crew member, add +1 for each crew member present (up to +4). On a miss, envision how friction arises between crew members.
Assets.Ability3: When your crew member is at full health and you score a miss with a match while they are present, you may set their health to 0 and mark them as out of action.  If you do, treat the miss with a match as a strong hit.

Assets.Name: Flash Fox
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Your flash fox uses its short-range teleportation to bypass obstacles. When you make a move by directing your flash fox to teleport you a short distance away, roll +its health and boost.
Assets.Ability2: Your flash fox attempts to teleport you out of harm's way. When you [Endure Harm](Moves/Suffer/Endure_Harm), you may roll +its health with advantage. If you do and score a hit, reduce the loss of health you suffered by 1. On a miss, your [Companion Takes a Hit](Moves/Suffer/Companion_Takes_a_Hit) as well.
Assets.Ability3: Your flash fox has learned to coordinate its teleporting attacks with your own. When you [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) aided by the flash fox, add +1. If you [Clash](Moves/Combat/Clash), take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Furball
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Your cuddly furball coos softly to soothe your worries. When you [Hearten](Moves/Recover/Hearten) in the presence of your furball, boost. However, stress can physically harm your friend. When you [Endure Harm](Moves/Suffer/Endure_Harm) in the presence of your furball, your [Companion Takes a Hit](Moves/Suffer/Companion_Takes_a_Hit) as well.
Assets.Ability2: When you make an Adventure move (not [Check Your Gear](Moves/Adventure/Check_Your_Gear)) using your furball to help defuse a tense situation, to build good will between people, to encourage those with a broken spirit, or to support the downtrodden, boost.
Assets.Ability3: When you [Make a Connection](Moves/Connection/Make_a_Connection) move (not a progress move) with a fellow furball caretaker in the presence of your furballs, boost.

Assets.Name: Nano-Swarm
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Utility: Your swarm can access a system, analyze a mechanical issue, or become a small tool to help work on equipment.
Assets.Ability2: Surveillance: You can observe a situation remotely from your swarm's perspective.
Assets.Ability3: Combat: You swarm can attack a foe by consuming small bits of its matter.
Assets.Foreword: Your self-replicating nano-swarm can be released at a moment's notice and adapt to the situation at hand. With a brief rest, you can update its programming to one of the modes below or direct it to self-repair which returns it to full health. When you make a move leveraging your nano-swarm's mode, add +its health and then your [Companion Takes a Hit](Moves/Suffer/Companion_Takes_a_Hit).

Assets.Name: Waterwyrm
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Your waterwyrm uses its scaly hide and dagger-like teeth to overcome threats. When you make a move by sending the waterwyrm to directly attack a foe or smash an obstacle, roll +its health.
Assets.Ability2: When you make a move by directing your waterwyrm to entangle a foe or object in its long leviathan-like body, roll +its health and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: Your waterwyrm is harnessed and trained as a mount for underwater travel. When you ride your waterwyrm as you [Undertake an Expedition](Moves/Exploration/Undertake_an_Expedition) underwater, roll +its health.

Assets.Name: Immortal Coil
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1:
You no longer benefit from [Heal](Moves/Recover/Heal). Instead, you must [Repair](Moves/Recover/Repair) to regain health as a mechanical companion would. Also, add the following options to spend repair points
     * Clear wounded: 2 points
     * Clear permanently harmed: 4 points
Assets.Ability2: Your command vehicle can store a copy of your consciousness. When you take several hours, you may update your back-up. You may also selectively erase memories with this process. If you do, [Endure Stress](Moves/Suffer/Endure_Stress) (-2).
Assets.Ability3: Your command vehicle houses a simulacrum printer. When you die, a subspace signal stops pinging your ship. If your ship survives and detects the signal loss, its systems will automatically take a day or so to install your saved consciousness into a new body.
Assets.Foreword:
Once you [Fulfill Your Vow](Moves/Quest/Fulfill_Your_Vow) (rank
extreme or epic) to transfer your consciousness to an artificial body…

Assets.Name: Indefatigable
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you use your status as a rough and tough survivor to [Compel](Moves/Adventure/Compel) people who know of your previous ship's destruction, boost.
Assets.Ability2:
When you [Sojourn](Moves/Recover/Sojourn) and score a hit, you may regale the local community with the story of how you lost your previous ship. If you do, choose one:
     * Revel in your tenacity: Take +2 momentum.
     * Leverage your status: [Gather Information](Moves/Adventure/Gather_Information) +heart (instead of +wits).
Assets.Ability3: When you [Withstand Damage](Moves/Suffer/Withstand_Damage), roll with advantage. Then, if you score a strong hit and choose to ride it out, take +2 momentum (instead of +1).

Assets.Name: Soulless
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you are at 0 spirit and [Endure Stress](Moves/Suffer/Endure_Stress) or [Face Desolation](Moves/Threshold/Face_Desolation), add +1. You may then reroll your action die if its value is less than your health.
Assets.Ability2: When you [Compel](Moves/Adventure/Compel) someone to act against their will or to their own detriment, you may burn momentum to zero out one (not both) of the challenge dice if your momentum is greater than the value of that die. If you do, erase one tick from your bonds legacy track.
Assets.Ability3: When you [Gather Information](Moves/Adventure/Gather_Information) by studying a place where suffering or torment left its mark, you may confront the visceral nature of the scene and roll +iron. If you do, take +1 momentum on a hit. On a strong hit with a match, you experience an insightful vision or disturbing revelation of what occurred here. Take +1 momentum more.

Assets.Name: Traveler
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you overcome a miss by shuffling through realities and calling forth one where you succeed, improve the result to a strong hit. Then, fill one segment of a six-segment clock representing stress on reality. When the clock is filled, a localized crack in the multiverse forms. Envision the dire consequences and reset the clock.
Assets.Ability2: When you search the timeline for possible futures, enact the first ability of the Seer path asset.
Assets.Ability3: When you create a link to the current point in time, enact the second ability on the Looper path asset but add options for the time gap of +1 if weeks, +0 if months, and -1 if years.
Assets.Foreword: Once you have returned from an alternate reality or timeline touched by the chaotic energy of the multiverse…

Assets.Name: Mech Printer
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: Your starship carries a specialized 3D printer for building mechs.  When you have time and resources to spend, you may spend three experience points or four wealth to print a mech chassis of your choice.
Assets.Ability2: Your printer can now print modules for your mech.  When you have time and resources to spend, you may spend two experience points or three wealth to print and attach a mech module of your choice.
Assets.Ability3: After printing a mech, maintaining it, adding modules to it, and surviving a significant battle with it, you may name the mech.  If you do, mark it as your primary mech.  When you [Withstand Damage](Moves/Suffer/Withstand_Damage) in your primary mech, you may roll +heart.  If you do, [Endure Stress](Moves/Suffer/Endure_Stress) (-1) on a weak hit or miss.

Assets.Name: Wealth Management
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you [Swear an Iron Vow](Moves/Quest/Swear_an_Iron_Vow) to complete a job for payment, reroll any dice.  When you [Fulfill Your Vow](Moves/Quest/Fulfill_Your_Vow), take +wealth equal to the rank of the vow.  If you leverage wealth on a move, add +wealth and suffer -1 wealth.  Additionally, you may suffer -6 wealth to clear the Indebted burden or to make a game-changing investment.
Assets.Ability2: When in a place you can [Resupply](Moves/Recover/Resupply), you may either suffer -2 wealth and take +1 supply or suffer -2 supply and take +1 wealth.
Assets.Ability3: When you search a wreck, ruin, or abandoned site for something of monetary value, roll +wits twice and keep the lower action die value.  On a hit, take +1 wealth.  On a strong hit, make it +2.

Assets.Name: Medusa
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you make a move to disrtupt or hack a specific foe, threat or secure system, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability2:
When you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) or [Gather Information](Moves/Adventure/Gather_Information) by scanning your surroundings or analyzing a nearby object, choose one (before rolling) and take +1 momentum on a hit.
  * Manual scan: Add +1.
  * Automated scan: Preset your action die to the Medusa's integrity.
Assets.Ability3: When you [Enter the Fray](Moves/Combat/Enter_the_Fray) against an ambush, or [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) to detect a hidden threat, you may roll +integrity.  If you do, reroll any dice and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Predator
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you are cloaked and make a move against a specific foe or threat to avoid detection, you may preset your action die to the Predator's integrity.  If utilizing cover, make it one more (up to six).
Assets.Ability2: When you [Enter the Fray](Moves/Combat/Enter_the_Fray) while cloaked, add +1 and mark progress on a strong hit.
Assets.Ability3:
When you [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) while cloaked, you may roll +shadow.  If you do, choose one (before rolling):
  * Strike true: Reroll any dice.
  * Strike hard: Mark progress on a hit.
On a strong hit with a match, you also remain totally undetected; take +2 momentum and add +1 if your next move is a [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike).

Assets.Name: Gladiator
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) or [React Under Fire](Moves/Combat/React_Under_Fire) by taking a hit or crashing through an obstacle, you may (after rolling) replace the value of your action die with the Gladiator's integrity; if you do, [Lose Momentum](Moves/Suffer/Lose_Momentum) (-1).
Assets.Ability2: When you [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) or [Clash](Moves/Combat/Clash) with brutal power by overcharging weapons or overloading melee servos, you may add +integrity/2 (rounded up).  If you do, count a weak hit as a miss.
Assets.Ability3: When you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) or [Gain Ground](Moves/Combat/Gain_Ground) using the staggering strength or resistance of the Gladiator, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Zephyr
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability1: When you [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger) or [React Under Fire](Moves/Combat/React_Under_Fire) to navigate through hazardous skies, avoid obstacles, or evade an attack, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability2: When you [Enter the Fray](Moves/Combat/Enter_the_Fray) by speeding towards a strategic position, you may reroll any dice.  On a strong hit, add +1 to your next move.
Assets.Ability3: When you fire your afterburner to [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) or [Gain Ground](Moves/Combat/Gain_Ground) to perform a risky maneuver, you may add +integrity/2 (rounded up) and take +2 momentum on a strong hit.  If you do, count a weak hit as a miss.

Assets.Name: Concussive Missiles
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability:
Your missile array is armed with 5 ammo. If you [Resupply](Moves/Recover/Resupply) in a place where your missiles can be replenished, you may exchange any earned +supply for +ammo.

When you make a move by launching a concussive missile, suffer -1 ammo. On a hit, take +1 momentum and add +1 to your next move (not a progress move).

Assets.Name: Energy Whip
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: Your mech wields a chain whip that can be charged with ionized particles. When you charge your whip, roll +iron. On a hit, take up to +3 energy. On a weak hit, take up to +2. On a miss, take up to +2 but suffer -1 integrity. The whip’s max energy is 3. When you make moves aided by this energy to attack or overcome obstacles, add +2 and suffer -1 energy.

Assets.Name: Gatling Gun
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: When you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by laying down suppression fire and score a hit, add an additional +1 to your next move or take an additional +1 momentum. When you [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) with a hail of bullets (decide before rolling), mark an additional progress on a hit but [Lose Momentum](Moves/Suffer/Lose_Momentum) (-1).

Assets.Name: Gravity-Shift Mace
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability:
When you make a move to attack, damage or destroy by altering the gravity of your mace, choose the gravitational force before rolling: 2 g, 3 g, or 4 g.

If either challenge die is equal to or less than the gravitational force, count a strong hit as a strong hit with a match and a weak hit as a strong hit.

If both challenge dice are greater than the gravitational force and your action die is equal to or less than the gravitational force, you are put at a disadvantage or set off an unintended effect; count a weak hit as a miss.

Assets.Name: Kinetic Hammer
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability:
When you score a hit with a [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) or [Clash](Moves/Combat/Clash) with this hammer, mark this module as charged.

When you [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) or [Clash](Moves/Combat/Clash) with your charged hammer, you may release the stored kinetic energy. If you release the energy on a [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike), count a miss as a weak hit. If you release the energy on a [Clash](Moves/Combat/Clash), count a weak hit as a strong hit. After you resolve the move, the hammer loses its charge.

Assets.Name: Nanocarbon Blade
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: When you [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) or [Clash](Moves/Combat/Clash) in close quarters, add +1. On a strong hit with a match, you are unstoppable; mark progress.

Assets.Name: Omega Cannon
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability:
When you begin charging your omega cannon, set aside a d6 set to a value of 1 known as the omega die. When you have time to line up a devastating [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) with your omega cannon, you may add +omega die and mark progress on a hit a number of additional times equal to the charge/2 (rounded up). If you do, remove the omega die after resolving the [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike).

If you make a move other than [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) while the omega cannon is charging, increase the value of the omega die by one. If the omega die is at a value of 6 when you would increase it or if the omega die increases above your mech’s integrity, the cannon overloads. Suffer -2 integrity and remove the omega die.

Assets.Name: Smart Missiles
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability:
Your missile array is armed with 5 ammo. If you [Resupply](Moves/Recover/Resupply) in a place where your missiles can be replenished, you may exchange any earned +supply for +ammo.

When you make a move by launching a smart missile, suffer -1 ammo and roll +wits as the on-board targeting systems take over.

Assets.Name: Sniper Rail Gun
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability:
When you have time to line up a shot and [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) from a distance with your sniper rail gun, choose one (before rolling).
  * Body shot: Add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
  * Head shot: Mark progress on a hit.

When you are hidden and score a hit with this weapon, you may remain hidden from that foe.

Assets.Name: Deployable Cover
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: When you [Aid Your Ally](Moves/Adventure/Aid_Your_Ally), [Face Danger](Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger), or [React Under Fire](Moves/Combat/React_Under_Fire) by extending interlocking plates as cover for a friend, companion, or ally, add +1 and take +1 momentum. If your action die shows a 1, mark this module as broken.

Assets.Name: Energy Shields
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability:
When you raise your shields, roll +your mech’s integrity or +wits. On a strong hit, set your shields to 4. On a weak hit, make them 3. On a miss, make them 2 but [Lose Momentum](Moves/Suffer/Lose_Momentum) (-1).

With shields raised, if you [Withstand Damage](Moves/Suffer/Withstand_Damage), ignore damage up to the value of your shields and suffer -1 shields. Raised shields last for a few minutes. If reduced to 0, they cannot be raised again for an hour or so.

Assets.Name: Heavy Armor
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: When you [Withstand Damage](Moves/Suffer/Withstand_Damage), you may reroll one challenge die.

Assets.Name: Inertial Dampeners
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: When you [Withstand Damage](Moves/Suffer/Withstand_Damage), add +1. On a strong hit, take +1 momentum.

Assets.Name: Reactive Shields
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: When you [Withstand Damage](Moves/Suffer/Withstand_Damage) in a fight from close combat with a foe or threat and score a strong hit, mark progress as your armor lashes out at your foe with destructive energy.

Assets.Name: Adaptive Subroutines
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: When you make a move to hack or disrupt a specific foe, threat, or secure system and miss, set aside a d6 set to a value of 1 known as an invasion die. Until the end of the scene, when you make a move to hack or disrupt the same target, add +invasion die. On a miss, increase the value of your invasion die by 1. On a hit, remove the invasion die.

Assets.Name: Countermeasures
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability:
Your countermeasure array is armed with 3 chaff. If you [Resupply](Moves/Recover/Resupply) in a place where your countermeasures can be replenished, you may exchange any earned +supply for +chaff.

When a threat attacks while they have a sensor lock on you and you React Under Fire, you may fire chaff in an attempt to throw off their targeting matrix. If you do, suffer -1 chaff and treat a weak hit as a strong hit.

Assets.Name: Puppet Protocol
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: Your mech has aggressive viral coding allowing you to attempt controlling another mech. When you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) or [Gain Ground](Moves/Combat/Gain_Ground) by controlling another mech, add +1. On a strong hit, you may [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) +wits (one time) by directing the enemy mech to attack on your behalf.

Assets.Name: Sensor Lock
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: You can [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by taking the time to lock your sensors on a target. If you do and score a strong hit, for the rest of the scene, add +1 any time you make a move leveraging that sensor lock. The sensor lock is lost when you roll a 1 on the action die on any move against the target. On a weak hit, the same as above but the sensor lock is lost when you roll a 1, 2, or 3 on the action die on any move against the target. You may only have a sensor lock on one target at a time.

Assets.Name: Silent Running
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: When you make a move against a specific foe or threat to avoid detection, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Arachnos Arms
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: Your mech has additional limbs with some that are capable of finer manipulations and some that are meant for entangling foes. Envision how many limbs and their configuration. When you [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) or [Gain Ground](Moves/Combat/Gain_Ground) by attempting to disarm, trip, shove, grapple, or remove a module from an enemy mech, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Drones
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: Your mech can release a small swarm of drones which function as the Combat Bot asset with only the first ability unlocked and 3 integrity. You must [Repair](Moves/Recover/Repair) damaged drones as with a normal mechanical companion.

Assets.Name: Emergency Repair Nanites
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: Once per fight, you can [Repair](Moves/Recover/Repair) by releasing a nanite swarm that reinforces and repairs your armor. If you do, add +1 and treat your result as if you were "In the field" instead of "Under fire." On a hit, add "Take +2 momentum: 1 point" to your list of options.

Assets.Name: EVA Module
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: Your mech is equipped with maneuvering thrusters and pressurized for activity in space or underwater.

Assets.Name: Flight System
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability:
Your mech can hover mid-air, take flight in the atmosphere with the same maneuverability as a shuttle craft, travel at sub-light speeds when in space, make thrust-assisted leaps, and drop to a surface from altitude.

When you burn fuel to overcome a critical obstacle (decide after rolling), you may reroll any dice. If you do, [Sacrifice Resources](Moves/Suffer/Sacrifice_Resources) (-1).

Assets.Name: Gel Charges
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability:
Your mech carries 3 explosive gel packs that can be launched from a ranged weapon designed to take out structural supports. If you [Resupply](Moves/Recover/Resupply) in a place where these specialized explosives can be replenished, you may exchange any earned +supply for +gel pack.

When you make a move to attack, damage, destroy, or sabotage an object or structure by firing a gel charge, suffer -1 gel pack and roll +edge if you fire it from your weapon or roll +wits if you have time to place it manually. When you roll, roll the action die twice and keep the greater value. Then, if your action die alone is greater than both challenge dice, treat it as a strong hit with a match. If your action die alone is greater than one of the challenge dice, treat it as a strong hit.

Assets.Name: Grapple Gun
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: Your mech can [Secure an Advantage](Moves/Adventure/Secure_an_Advantage) by firing a magnetically charged anchor and tether. On a hit, the grapple finds its target. When you may make a move leveraging this tether, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit. The grapple stays anchored until you score a miss on a move leveraging it or you take the time to detach it from your frame. Only one such grapple can be attached at a time.

Assets.Name: Radioactive Core
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability: When you [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) or [Clash](Moves/Combat/Clash) in close quarters while your mech has 2 or less integrity, you may vent radiation from your core (decide before rolling). If you do, mark (an additional) progress on a hit but suffer -1 health on a miss.

Assets.Name: Ram Jets
Assets.Author: Eric Bright
Assets.Ability:
Your mech is equipped with a reinforced ramming surface and a short-burst hyper-acceleration jet.

When you [Strike](Moves/Combat/Strike) or [Gain Ground](Moves/Combat/Gain_Ground) by ramming a foe or obstacle at jet speed, you may roll +integrity. If you do, take +1 momentum on a hit. No matter the result, if the lowest challenge die is greater than your integrity, suffer -1 integrity.
